A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Star Wars fan\, I really didn't like this movie. Rian Johnson messed up on so many levels with this movie. There was barely any story\, so many characters were ruined\, and most of the jokes/bathos used in this film just made it not feel like a Star Wars movie. I could name so many more problems but I won't because everyone knows the rest. The only thing I liked from this movie was the cinematography and effects.
